title: Module 3: Robot Simulation with Gazebo
description: Welcome to Module 3, where we transition from the theoretical foundations of robotics to the practical realm of simulation. In this module, you will learn how to build, test, and refine robot behaviors in a virtual environment before deploying them to physical hardware. Simulation is a cornerstone of modern robotics development, offering a cost-effective and efficient way to iterate on complex systems. It bridges the gap between abstract concepts and tangible robotic systems, providing a safe and controlled sandbox for innovation.
